translations: vi.形成一丛；以沉重的步子行走

sentences.sentence: This clump of paper birch trunks was backlit by a blaze of reds and yellows.
sentences.translation: 这一丛纸桦树树干的背光是一片红黄相间的火焰。

sentences.sentence: Tom proudly marched into a thick clump of sumach bushes and said, "Here you are!"
sentences.translation: 汤姆得意地大步走进一丛茂密的绿树中说：“给你！”

sentences.sentence: Galaxies tend to clump together in clusters.
sentences.translation: 星系往往聚集形成星团。
